response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you for $11,500. This special price reflects my commitment to ensuring you have access to the best possible solution at a highly competitive rate. I believe this opportunity will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 11500}
